'''''Dry Clean''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to defeat the [[Hydro Hypostasis]] without destroying a single one of its Water Droplets (except when it is restoring HP.)


==Gameplay Notes==
* If a dark blue Water Droplet explodes on its own (instead of getting hit by the player), the achievement can still be succesfully triggered so long as the player does not destroy other Water Droplets.
